question: Which is the country of origin of the armoured personnel carrier "Anoa"?
explanation: Indonesia is the country of origin of the armoured personnel carrier "Anoa". The Anoa is a 6x6 armoured personnel carrier developed by PT Pindad, an Indonesian state-owned enterprise specialising in military and commercial products. The vehicle is named after the Anoa, which is a type of buffalo indigenous to Indonesia. The prototype was first unveiled at the 61st anniversary of the Indonesian National Armed Forces on October 5, 2006.
